law.history: Repealed 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 105, effective January 1, 1979. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 12, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(3). -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Standards and specifications fixed by regulations.
